attributes.action: stop this ridiculas unfair  action that is been taken against the modified car scene
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we are concerned that we the innocent public are yet again been penalised for a minority of people  that arent even part of the mod scene, there actions dont represent what we ( one of the largest public comunities ) are about, we go to carparks in areas wich arent occupied after shop hours to talk and show off our cars, maybe if the police were to keep a keen eye on the events there would be less idiots turning up leaving space for people and the public to pull in and check the cars out.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
